name: kickboard
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a light flat object that floats on water and that you hold onto when learning to swim, or when you want to swim using only your legs, or only your arms: Megan is five and uses a kickboard during her swimming lesson. To exercise your lower body, hold a kickboard so that for a few lengths you are using only your legs.
Creative Crop/Photodisc/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesFor a few weeks after the surgery, Phelps was confined to kicking in the pool with a kickboard.She suffered a slight concussion when another swimmer's kickboard struck her above the eye.To work your arms, hold the kickboard between your feet.
